question: How much does a Canadian student spend monthly in Seoul?
answer: A lean monthly budget starts at KRW 1,200,000–1,600,000: rent (off-campus studio) KRW 700k–900k, food KRW 300k–400k, transport KRW 60k–80k, mobile KRW 30k–40k, utilities KRW 80k–120k. Always check exchange rates and university housing options.

sources.title: Seoul Open Data Portal - Living Cost Survey
